 subclasses of AbstractTestGraph are simple enough that you can do it using=
 the reflection API, then there is no need to dynamically generate subclass=
es -- instead you need a better test suite builder, which I have just built=
.

I have just built ParameterizedTestSuite, which allows you to automatica=
lly build a suite of tests (from test* methods), but pass parameters to the=
 underlying test fixture.

I will post an article on this today, since I am=
 writing about it now. You can judge whether it gives you what you need.
